Title: Call and Response
Writer: Garth Ennis (based on the graphic novels by), Steve Dillon (based on the graphic novels by), Sam Catlin (developed by), Seth Rogen (developed by), Evan Goldberg (developed by), Sam Catlin, Mary Laws (story editor)
Actors: Dominic Cooper, Joseph Gilgun, Ruth Negga, Lucy Griffiths
Plot: Jesse hopes to follow through on his promise to obtain answers from Heaven; the entire town waits with bated breath.
